name: Wake Up Magical Girl
storyline:
By chance, you have just become the newest and soon-to-be-coolest Magical Girl in your totally hopeless, monster-ridden town! But, fear not for you won't be alone through this new awakening.

You'll be entrusted with your very own handy-dandy albeit oddly emotionally-constipated digital magical familiar, Hope, who will help you become the best Magical Girl you can be — for however long you may last.
summary: Wake Up Magical Girl is a deceptively cute, dystopian visual novel about becoming a Magical Girl in a totally hopeless, monster-ridden town with your very own emotionally-constipated magical familiar, Hope — for as long as you can.
